item.title: Blue tent dumped, 1st October
item.description:
Small blue tent (apparently empty) has been left on the green space, about 10 metres from Ravensbourne River. Been there about 2 weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ravensbourne Greenway, Southend, London

item.title: Road Work Signs not removed, 1st October

item.title: Marble Arch underground station exit 3 subway to Hyde Park, 1st October
item.description:
The subway has an overpowering odour of urine that is making staff and customers at Marble Arch station feel unwell. This area was apparently cleaned approximately a week ago but doe not smell as if it has. Please attend the subway as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 537, Oxford Street, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lack of consistence in street sweeping, 1st October
item.description:
There is no sweeping taking place in orsett terrace for a while and rubbish is left at all time creating hazard, attracting vermines - thise streets used to be sweeped everyday - we do not see any maintenance / care anymore
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Orsett Terrace, Bayswater, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Regular street litter behind Costcutter, 1st October
item.description:

item.title: Car appears to be abandoned, 1st October
item.description:
The car has been seen arriving one night, has not been moved or driven in weeks. Suspected to be stolen then left. Car is parked on the opposite side of the road, outside block 31-37 Rowton Road, London, SE18 2TE

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rowton Road, Shooters Hill, London

item.title: Blocked garden gate corner to Lancaster Grove., 1st October

item.title: People keep flying tipping just outside my garden door., 1st October
item.description:
Someone keep flying tipping just outside my garden door. It just happen again this afternoon. They left tons of rubbish outside my back door. Cause of it i am having rat problem too, and it is a big issue as saw them next to my 1 year old daughter playing outside in the garden.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London
Report on FixMyStreet
